About.Hours & facilities: Open Sun 2-5pm or by prior arrangement. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. No copying services available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Local collection and research within boundaries of City of Gosnells. (50% in-house).

Contact.Street address: City of Gosnells Museum, Homestead Road, Gosnells 6110
